verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H3947><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him, <S%H899><s%> and the garments, and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and the bull <S%H6499><s%> of the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> and the basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened bread; <S%H4682><s%>
and assemble <S%H6950><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> at <S%H5712><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him; <S%H5712><s%> and the congregation was assembled <S%H6950><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> "This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> to be done. <S%H6213><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and washed <S%H7364><s%> them with water. <S%H4325><s%>

He put <S%H5414><s%> the coat <S%H3801><s%> on him, <S%H2296><s%> tied the sash <S%H73><s%> on him, <S%H3847><s%> clothed him with the robe, <S%H4598><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%> on him, <S%H2296><s%> and he tied the skillfully woven band <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod <S%H646><s%> on him, <S%H640><s%> and fastened it to him with it.
He placed <S%H7760><s%> the breastplate <S%H2833><s%> on him; <S%H2833><s%> and in the breastplate he put <S%H5414><s%> the Urim <S%H224><s%> and the Thummim. <S%H8550><s%>

He set <S%H7760><s%> the turban <S%H4701><s%> on his head; <S%H7218><s%> and on the turban, <S%H4701><s%> in front, <S%H6440><s%> he set <S%H7760><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> plate, <S%H6731><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown; <S%H5145><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and anointed <S%H4886><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and all that was in it, <S%H6942><s%> and sanctified them.

He sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> it on the altar <S%H4196><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times, <S%H6471><s%> and anointed <S%H4886><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> and all its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and the basin <S%H3595><s%> and its base, <S%H3653><s%> to sanctify them. <S%H6942><s%>
He poured <S%H3332><s%> some of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> on Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s head, <S%H7218><s%> and anointed <S%H4886><s%> him, <S%H6942><s%> to sanctify him.

Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons, <S%H1121><s%> and clothed <S%H3847><s%> them with coats, <S%H3801><s%> and tied <S%H2296><s%> sashes <S%H73><s%> on them, <S%H2280><s%> and put headbands <S%H4021><s%> on them; <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

He brought <S%H5066><s%> the bull <S%H6499><s%> of the sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bull <S%H6499><s%> of the sin offering. <S%H2403><s%>

He killed <S%H7819><s%> it; <S%H4872><s%> and Moses took <S%H3947><s%> the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it around <S%H5439><s%> on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> with his finger, <S%H676><s%> and purified <S%H2398><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and poured <S%H3332><s%> out the blood <S%H1818><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> it, <S%H3722><s%> to make atonement for it.

He took <S%H3947><s%> all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that was on the innards, <S%H7130><s%> and the cover <S%H3508><s%> of the liver, <S%H3516><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and their fat; <S%H2459><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> burned <S%H6999><s%> it on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

But the bull, <S%H6499><s%> and its skin, <S%H5785><s%> and its flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and its dung, <S%H6569><s%> he burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> the camp; <S%H4264><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

He presented <S%H7126><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> of the burnt offering: <S%H5930><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram. <S%H352><s%>
He killed <S%H7819><s%> it; <S%H4872><s%> and Moses sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>
He cut <S%H5408><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> into its pieces; <S%H5409><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> burned <S%H6999><s%> the head, <S%H7218><s%> and the pieces, <S%H5409><s%> and the fat. <S%H6309><s%>

He washed <S%H7364><s%> the innards <S%H7130><s%> and the legs <S%H3767><s%> with water; <S%H4325><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> burned <S%H6999><s%> the whole ram <S%H352><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%> It was a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> for a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma. <S%H7381><s%> It was an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

He presented <S%H7126><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration: <S%H4394><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram. <S%H352><s%>

He killed <S%H7819><s%> it; <S%H4872><s%> and Moses took <S%H3947><s%> some of its blood, <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the tip <S%H8571><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s right <S%H3233><s%> ear, <S%H241><s%> and on the thumb <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and on the great toe <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> foot. <S%H7272><s%>

He brought <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons; <S%H1121><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> some of the blood <S%H1818><s%> on the tip <S%H8571><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> ear, <S%H241><s%> and on the thumb <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and on the great toe <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> foot; <S%H7272><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

He took <S%H3947><s%> the fat, <S%H2459><s%> and the fat tail, <S%H451><s%> and all the fat <S%H2459><s%> that was on the innards, <S%H7130><s%> and the cover <S%H3508><s%> of the liver, <S%H3516><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and their fat, <S%H2459><s%> and the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh; <S%H7785><s%>

and out of the basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> that was before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> he took <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cake, <S%H2471><s%> and one cake <S%H2471><s%> of oiled <S%H8081><s%> bread, <S%H259><s%> and one wafer, <S%H7550><s%> and placed <S%H7760><s%> them on the fat, <S%H2459><s%> and on the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh. <S%H7785><s%>

He put <S%H5414><s%> all these in Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s hands <S%H3709><s%> and in his sons <S%H1121><s%>' hands, <S%H3709><s%> and waved <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> them from their hands, <S%H3709><s%> and burned <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar <S%H4196><s%> on the burnt offering. <S%H5930><s%> They were a consecration <S%H4394><s%> for a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma. <S%H7381><s%> It was an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the breast, <S%H2373><s%> and waved <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> It was Moses <S%H4872><s%>' portion <S%H4490><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration, <S%H4394><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> some of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and some of the blood <S%H1818><s%> which was on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> it on Aaron, <S%H175><s%> on his garments, <S%H899><s%> and on his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and on his sons <S%H1121><s%>' garments <S%H899><s%> with him, <S%H6942><s%> and sanctified Aaron, <S%H175><s%> his garments, <S%H899><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>' garments with him. <S%H899><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> "Boil <S%H1310><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and there eat <S%H398><s%> it and the bread <S%H3899><s%> that is in the basket <S%H5536><s%> of consecration, <S%H4394><s%> as I commanded, <S%H6680><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H175><s%> 'Aaron and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall eat it. <S%H398><s%>'
What remains <S%H3498><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and of the bread <S%H3899><s%> you shall burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

You shall not go out <S%H3318><s%> from the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> until the days <S%H3117><s%> of your consecration <S%H4394><s%> are fulfilled: <S%H4390><s%> for he shall consecrate <S%H4390><s%> you seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
What has been done <S%H6213><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> so Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> to do, <S%H6213><s%> to make atonement for you. <S%H3722><s%>

You shall stay <S%H3427><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3119><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s command, <S%H4931><s%> that you don't <S%H4191><s%> die: for so I am commanded. <S%H6680><s%>"
Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> all the things <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
